issue.title: [Python] Define public Cython API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-819](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-819). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have a handful of `cdef api` declarations, but it might be useful to have a proper `pyarrow/api.pxd` file and a prescribed implementation pattern for other Cython users to link to and use the Arrow types in other Python extensions
